players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and Bob is mafia. Stay cautious."
You: "Stay alert, Bob might target Charlie next."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the detective"
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and keep an eye on Bob. The mafia is likely targeting the detective, so I advise everyone to be cautious."
You: "Be wary of Bob, as he is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and support Charlie in his role."

Diana: "Let's all stay vigilant and work together to uncover the mafia. Charlie, continue your investigation; Alice's death was suspicious and could be related to your role as detective. Bob, we need to keep an eye on you, but also support each other in finding the truth."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
